ocs_input.v

00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief OCS user input implementation with WISHBONE slave interface.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief ocs_input.v
00030 
00031 List of user input registers:
00032 \verbatim
00033 Implemented:
00034      [DSKDATR & *008  ER  P       Disk data early read (dummy address)          not implemented]
00035     JOY0DAT     *00A  R   D       Joystick-mouse 0 data (vert,horiz)            read implemented here
00036     
00037     JOY1DAT     *00C  R   D       Joystick-mouse 1 data (vert,horiz)            read implemented here
00038      [CLXDAT    *00E  R   D       Collision data register (read and clear)      read implemented here]
00039     
00040     JOYTEST     *036  W   D       Write to all four joystick-mouse counters at once
00041 
00042 Not implemented:
00043      [ADKCONR   *010  R   P       Audio, disk control register read             read not implemented here]
00044     POT0DAT     *012  R   P( E )  Pot counter pair 0 data (vert,horiz)          read not implemented here
00045     
00046     POT1DAT     *014  R   P( E )  Pot counter pair 1 data (vert,horiz)          
00047     POTGOR      *016  R   P       Pot port data read (formerly POTINP)
00048     POTGO       *034  W   P       Pot port data write and start
00049 \endverbatim
00050 */
00051 module ocs_input(
00052     //% \name Clock and reset

00053     //% @{
00054     input               CLK_I,
00055     input               reset_n,
00056     //% @}
00057     
00058     //% \name On-Screen-Display management interface

00059     //% @{
00060     input               on_screen_display,
00061     input               enable_joystick_1,
00062     //% @}
00063     
00064     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00065     //% @{
00066     input               CYC_I,
00067     input               STB_I,
00068     input               WE_I,
00069     input [8:2]         ADR_I,
00070     input [3:0]         SEL_I,
00071     input [31:0]        DAT_I,
00072     output reg [31:0]   DAT_O,
00073     output reg          ACK_O,
00074     //% @}
00075     
00076     //% \name Not aligned register access on a 32-bit WISHBONE bus

00077     //% @{
00078         // CLXDAT read implemented here
00079     output              na_clx_dat_read,
00080     input [15:0]        na_clx_dat,
00081         // POT0DAT read not implemented here
00082     input               na_pot0dat_read,
00083     output [15:0]       na_pot0dat,
00084     //% @}
00085     
00086     //% \name User input CIA interface

00087     //% @{
00088     // keyboard output
00089     input               sp_from_cia,
00090     output              sp_to_cia,
00091     output reg          cnt_to_cia,
00092     
00093     // CIA-A fire buttons
00094     output reg          ciaa_fire_0_n,
00095     output              ciaa_fire_1_n,
00096     //% @}
00097     
00098     //% \name drv_keyboard interface

00099     //% @{
00100     output              keyboard_ready,
00101     input               keyboard_event,
00102     input [7:0]         keyboard_scancode,
00103     
00104     // joystick on port 1
00105     input               joystick_1_up,
00106     input               joystick_1_down,
00107     input               joystick_1_left,
00108     input               joystick_1_right,
00109     input               joystick_1_fire,
00110     //% @}
00111     
00112     //% \name drv_mouse interface

00113     //% @{
00114     input               mouse_moved,
00115     input [8:0]         mouse_y_move,
00116     input [8:0]         mouse_x_move,
00117     input               mouse_left_button,
00118     input               mouse_right_button,
00119     input               mouse_middle_button
00120     //% @}
00121 );
00122 
00123 //-------------------- keyboard start
00124 assign sp_to_cia = ~sp_shift[7];
00125 
00126 assign keyboard_ready = (cnt_counter == 16'd0);
00127 
00128 
00129 reg [15:0] cnt_counter;
00130 reg [7:0] sp_shift;
00131 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00132     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00133         cnt_to_cia  <= 1'b1;
00134         cnt_counter <= 16'd0;
00135         sp_shift    <= 8'hFF;
00136     end
00137     else if(keyboard_event == 1'b1 && on_screen_display == 1'b0) begin
00138         sp_shift <= keyboard_scancode;
00139         cnt_counter <= cnt_counter + 16'd1;
00140         cnt_to_cia <= 1'b0;
00141     end
00142     else if(cnt_counter >= 16'd1 && cnt_counter <= 16'd15) begin
00143         cnt_counter <= cnt_counter + 16'd1;
00144         cnt_to_cia <= ~cnt_to_cia;
00145         if(cnt_to_cia == 1'b1) sp_shift <= { sp_shift[6:0], 1'b0 };
00146     end
00147     else if(cnt_counter == 16'd16 && sp_from_cia == 1'b0) begin
00148         cnt_counter <= cnt_counter + 16'd1;
00149     end
00150     else if(cnt_counter == 16'd17 && sp_from_cia == 1'b1) begin
00151         cnt_counter <= 16'd0;
00152     end
00153 /*  synchronization
00154     else if(cnt_counter == 16'd65535 && sp_from_cia == 1'b1) begin
00155         cnt_to_cia <= ~cnt_to_cia;
00156         cnt_counter <= 16'd16;
00157     end
00158     else if(cnt_counter >= 16'd16 && sp_from_cia == 1'b1) begin
00159         cnt_counter <= cnt_counter + 16'd1;
00160     end
00161     else sp_from_cia == 1'b0 -> sp_from_cia == 1'b0 begin
00162         cnt_counter <= 16'd0;
00163     end
00164 */
00165 end
00166 //-------------------- keyboard end
00167 
00168 
00169 assign na_pot0dat = 16'd0;
00170 
00171 assign na_clx_dat_read =
00172     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b0 && WE_I == 1'b0 && { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[1:0] != 2'b00);
00173 
00174 reg [15:0] potgo;
00175 reg [15:0] joy0dat;
00176 reg [15:0] joy1dat;
00177 reg right_button_n;
00178 reg middle_button_n;
00179 
00180 wire [15:0] joy1dat_final;
00181 assign joy1dat_final =
00182     (enable_joystick_1 == 1'b1)?
00183     {   6'b0,                               //15-10
00184         joystick_1_left,                    //9
00185         joystick_1_up ^ joystick_1_left,    //8
00186         6'b0,                               //7-2
00187         joystick_1_right,                   //1
00188         joystick_1_down ^ joystick_1_right  //0
00189     } :
00190     joy1dat;
00191 
00192 assign ciaa_fire_1_n = (enable_joystick_1 == 1'b1 && joystick_1_fire == 1'b1)? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
00193 
00194 wire [15:0] potgo_final;
00195 assign potgo_final = { 1'b0, potgo[14], 1'b0, potgo[12], 1'b0, right_button_n, 1'b0, middle_button_n, 7'b0, 1'b0 };
00196 
00197 wire [8:0] joy0dat_y;
00198 assign joy0dat_y = { joy0dat[15], joy0dat[15:8] } - mouse_y_move;
00199 
00200 wire [8:0] joy0dat_x;
00201 assign joy0dat_x = { joy0dat[7], joy0dat[7:0] } + mouse_x_move;
00202 
00203 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00204     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00205         DAT_O           <= 32'd0;
00206         ACK_O           <= 1'b0;
00207         
00208         ciaa_fire_0_n   <= 1'b1;
00209         
00210         potgo           <= 16'd0;
00211         joy0dat         <= 16'd0;
00212         joy1dat         <= 16'd0;
00213         
00214         right_button_n  <= 1'b1;
00215         middle_button_n <= 1'b1;
00216     end
00217     else begin
00218         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b0) ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00219         else                                                ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00220         
00221         if(mouse_moved == 1'b1) begin
00222             joy0dat[15:8] <= joy0dat_y[7:0];
00223             joy0dat[7:0] <= joy0dat_x[7:0];
00224             
00225             ciaa_fire_0_n   <= ~mouse_left_button;
00226             right_button_n  <= ~mouse_right_button;
00227             middle_button_n <= ~mouse_middle_button;
00228         end
00229         
00230         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0) begin
00231             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h008)                       DAT_O[31:0]     <= { 16'd0 /*DSKDATR**/, joy0dat };
00232             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h00C)                       DAT_O[31:0]     <= { joy1dat_final, na_clx_dat };
00233             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h014)                       DAT_O[31:0]     <= { 16'd0 /*POT1DAT**/, potgo_final };
00234         end
00235         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1) begin
00236             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h034 && SEL_I[3] == 1'b1)   potgo[15:8] <= DAT_I[31:24];
00237             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h034 && SEL_I[2] == 1'b1)   potgo[7:0]  <= DAT_I[23:16];
00238             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h034 && SEL_I[1] == 1'b1)   { joy0dat[15:8], joy1dat[15:8] } <= { DAT_I[15:8], DAT_I[15:8] };
00239             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h034 && SEL_I[0] == 1'b1)   { joy0dat[7:0], joy1dat[7:0] } <= { DAT_I[7:0], DAT_I[7:0] };
00240         end
00241     end
00242 end
00243 
00244 endmodule
